description: Close to Ǧabal Ḫayabir in Iraq, this site was an important mercantile center of southern Mesopotamia and capital of Characene. The ancient site is located close to Ǧabal Ḫayabir.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Jebel Khayabir, IRQ
